m_szDocTitle: Using Bitcoin Tech, Australians Test Selling Solar Electricity To Each Other | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Using Bitcoin Tech, Australians Test Selling Solar Electricity To Each Other August 18th, 2016 by Steve Hanley   Originally published on sister site SolarLove . In Western Australia, an 8-week experiment is underway in the National Lifestyle Villages in Busselton, near Perth. Using the virtual monetary technology behind “bitcoin,” 10 households will be able to track their energy usage and the amount of excess electricity generated by their rooftop solar systems. The software will allow them to see how much money they could be paid for that excess solar power if
